channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Apple sued over abandoning CSAM detection for iCloud
item.description: Apple is being sued over its decision not to implement a system that would have scanned iCloud photos for child sexual abuse material (CSAM). The laws...

item.title: These 3 Things Are Standing in the Way of a Global Plastics Treaty
item.description: Global plastic pollution talks have stalled—but a treaty is possible if countries can agree on finances, the proper regulation of dangerous ingredient...

item.title: Amazon Kindle Scribe (2nd Gen) Review: Room for More
item.description: The Scribe remains a great digital notebook for Kindle loyalists, even if not much has changed over the original.

item.title: These Brilliant BenQ ScreenBar Lamps Are My Favorite WFH Accessory
item.description: Light up a desk with this space-saving lamp that hangs over your computer monitor—now with motion sensing.

item.title: 25 Work From Home Gift Ideas
item.description: Upgrade your loved one’s home office with these picks that make every day a little easier—and a little more fun.

item.title: Queer-founded brand discovery platform Famm launches a LinkedIn for the LGBTQ+ community
item.description: Famm, the discovery platform for queer-owned brands, was created by BIPOC queer married couple Cat Perez and Marianna Di Regolo to help users find LGB...

item.title: To Build Electric Cars, Jaguar Land Rover Had to Redesign the Factory
item.description: At Jaguar Land Rover’s historic Halewood factory in Merseyside, England, state-of-the art assembly robots are now building the cars of the future.

item.title: Lead Edge is increasingly steering its 700+ investors away from VC deals
item.description: Mitchell Green worked variously in investment banking, as an analyst with Bessemer Venture Partners, and for a hedge fund backed by Tiger Management b...

item.title: Apple’s Vision Pro might add support for PlayStation VR controllers
item.description: Apple is looking to make its Vision Pro mixed reality device more attractive to gamers and game developers, according to a new report from Bloomberg’s...

item.title: UCLA offers comp lit course developed by AI
item.description: In winter 2025, a comparative literature class at UCLA will feature a textbook, homework assignments, and TA resources generated by AI. The class in q...
